We plan test 6 metabolism-boosting beverage follow order : 1 ) Raspberry Tea 2 ) Banana Shake 3 ) Chai Latte 4 ) Strawberry Shake 5 ) Cappuccino 6 ) Hot Cocoa . In order screen , subject assign receive 1 6 Metabolism-boosting beverage . Each MBB contain 90 mg EGCG 100 mg caffeine .
